meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4021.

td.p: Lindsey Bartlett, a junior from Winter Haven, Florida
Evan Stewart, a sophomore from Frankfort, Kentucky
Bernard Holloway, a junior from Mitchellville, Maryland

tr.td: MEDIEVAL TIMES
WHEN THEY WERE TEENAGERS
CANADIAN PROVINCES
EAT YOUR VEGGIES
SERMONIZING
FAMILIAR PHRASES
